paragraphs: =reunir=, _v. a._, to collect, to get together, to gather together, to assemble; =--se=, _v. refl._, to meet, to assemble, to come together. [p. 233]
=reventar=, _v. a._, to weary, to wear out, =95=, 18; _v. n._, to burst; =reventó de feo=, =48,= 25, was so ugly he burst.
=reverendo, da=, _adj._, reverend; =reverendo Obispo=, =44=, 14, Right Reverend Bishop.
=rezar=, _v. a. and n._, to pray; =rezando sus devociones=, =45=, 5, performing their devotions, saying their prayers.
